Body:
self.alg.settings['solver_family'] = 'petsc'
iterative_solvers = ['cg', 'groppcg', 'pipecg', 'pipecgrr', 'nash', 'stcg',
    'gltr', 'fcg', 'pipefcg', 'gmres', 'pipefgmres', 'fgmres', 'lgmres',
    'dgmres', 'pgmres', 'tcqmr', 'bcgs', 'ibcgs', 'fbcgs', 'fbcgsr',
    'bcgsl', 'pipebcgs', 'cgs', 'tfqmr', 'cr', 'pipecr', 'bicg', 'minres',
    'symmlq', 'lcd', 'gcr', 'pipegcr']
for solver in iterative_solvers:
    self.alg.settings['solver_type'] = solver
    self.alg.run()
    xmean = self.alg['pore.x'].mean()
    nt.assert_allclose(actual=xmean, desired=0.587595, rtol=1e-05)
catch_module_not_found
